transit_systems.name: New York City Transit (MTA)
transit_systems.description: The largest public transit agency in the U.S., operating subways, buses, and paratransit across the five boroughs of New York City.

transit_systems.name: Chicago Transit Authority (CTA)
transit_systems.description: Operates the second-largest public transit system in the U.S., providing rail and bus services throughout Chicago and surrounding suburbs.

transit_systems.name: Bay Area Rapid Transit (BART)
transit_systems.description: Regional heavy rail system serving the San Francisco Bay Area with high-capacity rapid transit across multiple counties.

transit_systems.name: Los Angeles Metro
transit_systems.description: Integrated transit system operating buses and rail lines, with one of the largest bus fleets in the country.

transit_systems.name: King County Metro
transit_systems.description: Known for innovative transit technology and frequent service, Metro operates buses, water taxis, and partnerships for regional rail.

transit_systems.name: Portland TriMet
transit_systems.description: Operates buses, light rail (MAX), and commuter rail (WES) with a focus on accessibility, equity, and environmental sustainability.

transit_systems.name: Denver RTD
transit_systems.description: Provides multimodal transit including bus, light rail, and commuter rail, with a focus on regional connectivity across the Denver metro area.

transit_systems.name: C-TRAN
transit_systems.description: Small but high-performing transit agency offering fixed-route, express, and paratransit services, including Bus Rapid Transit.

transit_systems.name: GoDurham
transit_systems.description: Well-regarded small urban system offering local and regional bus services with growing investment in transit infrastructure.

transit_systems.name: Chapel Hill Transit
transit_systems.description: University-town system known for fare-free service and high rider satisfaction; jointly operated by Chapel Hill, Carrboro, and UNC.

transit_systems.name: Corvallis Transit System
transit_systems.description: Small-city system providing fare-free fixed-route services focused on sustainability and serving Oregon State University.

transit_systems.name: Mountain Line
transit_systems.description: Award-winning fare-free system recognized for sustainability, strong community partnerships, and high per-capita ridership.

transit_systems.name: Island Transit
transit_systems.description: Provides fare-free rural and small-town transit services across island communities with a focus on access and equity.
